Author: ThatChicBitch
Text: We love you too! But in regards to your friend and how he reacted, try to bear in mind that there are a lot of ignorant people in the world. And ignorance does not necessarily coincide with or is the same as stupidity. By that I mean that he *may* have thought he wasn't being cruel and was coming from a sound piece of mind when he said that- even though it wasn't. Basically, it sucks that we have to essentially either coddle people or give them a full on documantarian style explanation of how EDs work, that they're mental illnesses and not fads, that you can't just turn it off and that it doesn't stem from a egocentric place. But, sometimes, most of the times, people just don't get it until we further inform them. Which is why knowledge and breaking stigmas are so important.  Anyway, we're here for you, OP!
